message.body: Sofie I'm thinking if we can have a projector inside the ball （like Daniel's project ) in addition to the external one, we can play dynamic color mix! Is that closer to what your idea?
That sounds do cool. How would we even begin to do. That
You guys want some Taiwanese fried rice with chicken for tomorrow?
Yes of course we do sounds amazing. So much better than Pizza.
Ok! See you tomorrow! I'll go to a Taiwanese talk tomorrow afternoon in Framingham , will get back to school by 6pm
Yay. Taiwanese food is better than pizza
we have fried rice in the fridge
